front.title: Extensions to BGP-LS for Advertising In-situ Flow Information Telemetry (IFIT) Node Capability

abstract.t: This document defines a way for an a Border Gateway Protocol Link- State (BGP-LS) speaker to announce IFIT node capabilities of routers to BGP-LS consumer. In this document, IFIT Node Capability TLV is defined as a new Node Attribute TLV that is encoded in the BGP-LS attribute with Node NLRIs [RFC7752]. Such advertisements enable In- situ Flow Information Telemetry (IFIT) applications in an operational network domain.
